mapper.insert: INSERT INTO owl.DRIVEFILE (FILENAME, FILESIZE, CREATOR, DRIVEIDX) VALUES(#{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{creator}, #{driveIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT DRIVEIDX, FOLDERNAME, REF, DEPTH, PROJECTIDX FROM DRIVEFOLDER WHERE PROJECTIDX = #{projectIdx};
SELECT DRIVEFILEIDX, FILENAME, CREATOR, M.NAME AS 'CREATORNAME', FILESIZE, CREATEDATE FROM owl.DRIVEFILE F JOIN owl.MEMBER M ON F.CREATOR = M.EMAIL WHERE DRIVEIDX = #{folderIdx} AND ISDELETE = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE DRIVEFOLDER SET FOLDERNAME =#{param1} WHERE DRIVEIDX =#{param2}
mapper.select: SELECT F.DRIVEFILEIDX, F.FILENAME, F.CREATOR, F.FILESIZE, F.CREATEDATE, F.DRIVEIDX FROM PROJECT P LEFT JOIN DRIVEFOLDER D ON P.PROJECTIDX = D.PROJECTIDX LEFT JOIN DRIVEFILE F ON D.DRIVEIDX = F.DRIVEIDX WHERE F.ISDELETE = 1 AND P.PROJECTIDX = #{projectIdx};
